name: Sour Cream Rhubarb Pie
author: David S. Novak
summary: A pie recipe my whole family loves and begs my mother to make when we have a get together. Wonderful warmed and with a side of vanilla ice cream! I dedicate this recipe to Grace M. Novak.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Beat 1 1/4 cups sugar, sour cream, eggs and  2 tablespoons flour in a large mixing bowl until smooth
Pour rhubarb mixture into pie shell
Bake for 30 minutes in the preheated oven
Meanwhile, combine 1/3 cup sugar, 1/3 cup flour, and cinnamon in a small bowl
Cut in butter with fork or pastry blender until mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Sprinkle topping mixture evenly over pie
Return pie to oven and bake until filling is set and crust and topping are golden brown, about 30 minutes
